tags: Ministry responsible: Public Works and Government Services
Delivery Location: Cap-aux-Meules Port, located in Quebec
Customer (End-User): Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Department of Transport
full_summary:
Title
================
EE519-231608-B Upgrade to Fender System and Replacement of Fender System, Cap-aux-Meules Port

Government Tender Announcement
------------------------------
### Project Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the upgrade to the Fender System and replacement of the existing Fender System at the Port of Cap-aux-Meules.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3839962308
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3839962308
* **Publication Date:** March 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 23, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 23, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** December 15, 2023
* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity:** None

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** March 8, 2023
* **Amendment Date:** March 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 23, 2023
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of bids will be based on the **Lowest Price**.

### Method of Procurement

This procurement is conducted under the **Competitive - Open Bidding** method.

### Notice URL

For more information, please visit the following website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15635906?extsite=MTU2MzU5MDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Maude Roy-Lippe
* **Email:** maude.roy-lippe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date to be considered.
